title: Stock Market Live Updates 22 January 2026: Sensex extends gains to over 800 points at 82,742, Nifty jumps 267 points to 25,424; Dr Reddy's up 4.6%
text:
Sensex, Nifty, Share Prices LIVE 22 January 2026: Benchmark indices opened sharply higher on Thursday, staging a strong recovery after three consecutive sessions of decline, as global risk sentiment improved following US President Donald Trump’s decision to roll back tariff threats against European nations. The Sensex opened at ₹82,459.66, up from its previous close of ₹81,909.63, and was trading at ₹82,742.16, gaining 832.53 points or 1.02 per cent at 9.50 a.m. The Nifty opened at ₹25,344.15 against its previous close of ₹25,157.50 and surged to ₹25,424.70, up 267.20 points or 1.06 per cent.
The pharmaceutical sector led the gains, with Dr Reddy’s Laboratories surging 4.67 per cent to ₹1,211.20.
label: neutral
